author: Kate Aurthur
title: This 2014 Tweet From Donald Trump About "Black-ish" Went Viral During The Golden Globes
text:
View this image ‚Ä∫
NBC
ID: 10287108
Proving that there might be an incendiary Donald Trump tweet for every occasion, Dave Itzkoff of the New York Times unearthed this one from Oct. 2014. How is ABC Television allowed to have a show entitled "Blackish"? Can you imagine the furor of a show, "Whiteish"! Racism at highest level?
‚Äî Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) ID: 10287131
Itzkoff‚Äôs tweet, ‚Äú Never forget ,‚Äù has been retweeted more than 1,900 times, as of this writing. But some people had to be convinced it was real. at first i thought it was the fake trump account that tweeted this then i realized https://t.co/opu4wa79g2
‚Äî ‡¶®‡¶æ‡¶∞‡ßÄ‡¶® (@nareenz) ID: 10287162 Wait...this isn't real, right? This is an #snl joke? https://t.co/9vEIAH9QGt
‚Äî Rebecca O'Donnell (@RDBlueCanary) ID: 10287172 When I saw this, I literally thought, oh some stupid kid is mouthing off. Then I saw who it was. The president-elec‚Ä¶ https://t.co/3zBr8OUb01
‚Äî sum üò∞ one (@enargins) ID: 10287177 OM I 100% THOUGHT A PARODY ACCOUNT TWEETED THIS... WE ARE FUCKING DOOMED ITS OVER. THIS BITCH IS REALLY O‚Ä¶ https://t.co/qlUEqAqIpw
‚Äî sophia petrillo stan (@rebelthot) ID: 10287187 When I saw that someone had "never forget" tweeted this (sorry, can't find it anymore) I thought it had to be from‚Ä¶ https://t.co/3i7PMNe7GN
‚Äî Joy Reid (@JoyAnnReid) ID: 10287199 Others marveled that Trump will soon be sworn in as president. Sounds to me like the ravings of a crazy old man and not the leader of the free world but I'm not an expert üôÑ https://t.co/HQOKP8GOWP
‚Äî Sana (@tweetsbysana) ID: 10287207 So glad we didn't make this guy our Presi.... OH DEAR GOD! https://t.co/e9S9wHTWeL
‚Äî Charles (@MrLXC) ID: 10287209 Next president.. Yikes üëÄ https://t.co/NeZwfx7nVh
‚Äî Dimeji Babalola (@dimejibabalola) ID: 10287216 "but Trump and Hillary are equally bad!111!!!11!" seriously I can't believe people irl are still saying shit like‚Ä¶ https://t.co/CseECW66cz
‚Äî Aditi (@secofsnark) ID: 10287222 And some wanted to let Trump know that ‚ÄúWhiteish‚Äù has already been on the air. It's called "Friends" and it was very popular in the 90s and early 2000s https://t.co/LLm02LUnfP
‚Äî Kit (@maybemarvellous) ID: 10287241 Um @realDonaldTrump White Shadow, White Princess, Whites, White Collar, White Nights, Snow White and the 7 Dwarves‚Ä¶ https://t.co/wXCYd4m0l7
